title: The Fiend

feature_defs.trigger: when you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points
effects: gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level
limits: temporary hit points do not stack

feature_defs.trigger: after you roll a d20 test but before the outcome is determined
limits: once per short or long rest

feature_defs.trigger: when you finish a short or long rest
effects: choose one damage type (other than force)
gain resistance to the chosen damage type
limits: you can change the chosen damage type when you finish a short or long rest

feature_defs.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack
effects: target is removed from the battlefield and experiences a hellish vision
target takes 10d10 psychic damage at the end of your next turn

notes: The Fiend patron emphasizes survivability, burst damage, and punishment on hit.
